rukus.text: 17|23|Ara apanara raba adesa diyechena tini chara an'ya karo'ibadata na karate [1] o pita-matara prati sadbyabahara karate [2]. Tara ekajana ba ubhaya'i tomara jibaddasaya bardhakye upanita hale taderake'upha' bala na ebam taderake dhamaka di'o na [3]; tadera sathe sam'manasucaka katha bala [4].
17|24|Ara mamatabase tadera prati namratara paksaputa abanamita kara [1] ebam bala, â€˜he amara raba! Tamdera prati daya karuna yebhabe saisabe tamra amake pratipalana karechilena [2].â€™
17|25|Tomadera raba tomadera antare ya ache ta bhalo janena; yadi tomara satkarmaparayana ha'o tabe'i to tini allaha-abhimukhidera prati khuba'i ksamasila [1]
17|26|ara atmiyasbajanake da'o, tamra prapya ebam abhabagrastha o musaphiraderake'o [1] ebam kichute'i apabyaya kara na [2].
17|27|Niscaya'i yara apabyaya kare tara sayatanera bha'i ebam sayatana tara rabera prati khuba'i akrtajna [1].
17|28|Ara yadi tadera theke tamara mukha phirate'i haya, yakhana tomara rabera kacha theke anugraha labhera pratyasaya, takhana tadera sathe namrabhabe katha bala [1]
17|29|ara tumi tomara hata galaya bemdhe rekho na ebam ta sampurnarupe mele'o di'o na, tahale tumi tiraskrta o aphasosakrta haye base parabe [1].
17|30|Niscaya'i tomara raba yara jan'ya icche tamra riyaka bariye dena ebam yara jan'ya icche ta simita karena; niscaya tini tamra bandadera sambandhe samyaka parijnata, sarbadrasta [1].
